title: Event
description: An event that occurred, typically in response to a user.  See https://github.com/o19s/opensearch-ubi/blob/2.14.0/src/main/resources/events-mapping.json for more info.

application.description: name of the application tracking UBI events (e.g. _amazon-shop_, _ABC-microservice_)

action_name.description: Eric: should have an anyOf with an enum.  .any name you want to call your event. For example, with javascript events, you could include on_click, logon, add_to_cart, page_scroll

query_id.description: The unique identifier of a query, typically a GUID.
